second_stage.eng: Great, do you want to receive notifications for Taker deals as well, or leave only Maker deals?

finished_stage.eng: Excellent! The setup is finished. For the bot start working, click the "Subscribe" button.
finished_stage.restage_eng: In order for the bot to start working, click the "Subscribe" button.

bundle_error.eng: This telegram account is already linked to a Bitexbook account with an id:

upd_lang_menu.eng: The operation was successfully completed. You have set the language to English

upd_maker_taker_menu.eng: You have subscribed to the Taker-deals newsletter.
upd_maker_taker_menu.eng_1: You have unsubscribed from receiving information on Taker transactions. Now you will receive information only on Maker deals.

next_menu_settings.eng: The transition to the "Settings" menu has been completed.

back_menu_settings.eng: The transition to back to the main menu is completed.

change_lang.eng: What language do you prefer to communicate in?

change_taker_switch.eng: Do you want to receive notification of Taker-deals or leave only Maker-deals?

support_service.eng: If you have a question, please contact [customer support](https://bitexbook.com/en/about/contacts)

subscribe_phrase.eng: You have successfully subscribed to the newsletter!
subscribe_phrase.eng_err_sub: You have already subscribed to the newsletter.
subscribe_phrase.error_eng: An error occurred while performing the operation. Start the subscription operation again through [our site](https://bitexbook.com/en/account/notice)
